title: Did Ig Bar visit Jeffrey Epstein's prison before his apparent suicide?
subtitle: The prosecution came from a person whose experience in this matter stated that in 1992 he had repeatedly visited the same prison where Epstein would have been held before his death in 2019.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The U.S. Attorney-General William Bar secretly visited the prison where Jeffrey Epstein was held "about two weeks" before the death of the latter in the summer of 2019.
